about.title: About Me
about.content_1: I am Svante Kokkoniemi, a Finnish web developer. I build fast and polished web applications with modern technologies.
about.content_2: Programming began as a hobby and grew into a profession. I am motivated by creating solutions that combine usability, efficiency, and visual appeal.
about.content_3: I have learned independently and through projects. Currently, I focus particularly on frontend technologies, AI integration, and SEO optimization.
